title: Vanilla Ammunition Items - Complete Reference
content:
# Vanilla Ammunition Items - Complete Reference

## Overview
This document catalogs all vanilla Project Zomboid ammunition-related items, including rounds, boxes, magazines, molds, and crafting materials.

## Ammunition Rounds

### Individual Rounds
| Name              | Item ID              | Weight | Count | Metal Value |
|-------------------|----------------------|--------|-------|-------------|
| .223 Round        | `Base.223Bullets`    |  0.02  |   1   |      1      |
| .308 Round        | `Base.308Bullets`    |  0.02  |   1   |      1      |
| .38 Special Round | `Base.Bullets38`     |  0.02  |   1   |      1      |
| .44 Magnum Round  | `Base.Bullets44`     |  0.04  |   1   |      1      |
| .45 Auto Round    | `Base.Bullets45`     |  0.04  |   1   |      1      |
| 5.56mm Round      | `Base.556Bullets`    |  0.03  |   1   |      1      |
| 9mm Round         | `Base.Bullets9mm`    |  0.01  |   1   |      1      |
| Shotgun Shells    | `Base.ShotgunShells` |  0.05  |   1   |      1      |

### Usage in Recipes
```
recipe Example {
    Base.Bullets9mm=10,      // 10 rounds of 9mm
    Base.ShotgunShells=6,    // 6 shotgun shells

    Result:Output,
}
```

## Ammunition Boxes

### Box Containers
| Name | Item ID | Weight | Contents |
|------|---------|--------|----------|
| Box of .223 Rounds | `Base.223Box` | 0.6 | .223 ammo |
| Box of .308 Rounds | `Base.308Box` | 0.6 | .308 ammo |
| Box of .38 Special Rounds | `Base.Bullets38Box` | 0.35 | .38 ammo |
| Box of .44 Magnum Rounds | `Base.Bullets44Box` | 0.38 | .44 ammo |
| Box of .45 Auto Rounds | `Base.Bullets45Box` | 1.0 | .45 ammo |
| Box of 5.56mm Rounds | `Base.556Box` | 1.2 | 5.56mm ammo |
| Box of 9mm Rounds | `Base.Bullets9mmBox` | 0.2 | 9mm ammo |
| Box of Shotgun Shells | `Base.ShotgunShellsBox` | 0.9 | Shotgun shells |

### Box Recipes (Vanilla)
```
// Opening a box
recipe Open Box of 9mm Bullets {
    Bullets9mmBox,

    Result:Bullets9mm=30,    // 30 loose rounds
    Sound:BoxOfRoundsOpenOne,
    Time:15.0,
}

// Packing a box
recipe Place 9mm Bullets in Box {
    Bullets9mm=30,

    Result:Bullets9mmBox,
    Sound:BoxOfRoundsOpenOne,
    Time:15.0,
}
```

## Magazines (Clips)

### Magazine Items
| Name | Item ID | Weight | Weapon | Ammo Type | Capacity |
|------|---------|--------|--------|-----------|----------|
| M9 Magazine | `Base.9mmClip` | 0.2 | M9 Pistol | 9mm | 15 |
| M1911 Auto Magazine | `Base.45Clip` | 0.2 | M1911 Pistol | .45 Auto | 7 |
| D-E Magazine | `Base.44Clip` | 0.2 | D-E Pistol | .44 Magnum | 8 |
| MSR700 Magazine | `Base.223Clip` | 0.2 | MSR700 Rifle | .223 | 3 |
| MSR788 Magazine | `Base.308Clip` | 0.2 | MSR788 Rifle | .308 | 3 |
| M16 Magazine | `Base.556Clip` | 0.2 | M16 Assault Rifle | 5.56mm | 30 |
| M14 Magazine | `Base.M14Clip` | 0.2 | M14 Rifle | .308 | 20 |

### Usage Notes
- Magazines are loaded with ammunition
- Each magazine is specific to a weapon
- Magazines can be reloaded with appropriate ammo

## Bullet Molds

### Mold Items (Future Feature)
| Icon | Name | Item ID | Weight | Metal Value | Status |
|------|------|---------|--------|-------------|--------|
| | .223 Bullet Mold | `Base.223BulletsMold` | 0.5 | 15 | Future |
| | .308 Bullet Mold | `Base.308BulletsMold` | 0.5 | 15 | Future |
| | 9mm Bullet Mold | `Base.9mmBulletsMold` | 0.5 | 15 | Future |
| | Shotgun Shells Mold | `Base.ShotgunShellsMold` | 0.5 | 15 | Future |

**Note:** Molds are marked as "Future" in vanilla but exist in game files and can be used in mods.

### Mold Properties
```
item 9mmBulletsMold {
    DisplayCategory = Ammo,
    Weight = 0.5,
    Type = Normal,
    DisplayName = 9mm Bullets Mold,
    Icon = BulletMold,
    MetalValue = 15,
    WorldStaticModel = ShotGunShellsMold_Ground,
}
```

### Using Molds in Recipes
```
recipe Craft 9mm Bullets {
    keep Base.9mmBulletsMold,    // Reusable mold
    keep Base.Hammer,
    Base.ScrapMetal=2,
    Base.GunPowder=10,

    Result:Base.Bullets9mm=10,
    Time:300.0,
}
```

## Crafting Materials

### GunPowder (CRITICAL)
**Item ID:** `Base.GunPowder`

**Full Definition:**
```
item GunPowder {
    DisplayCategory = Material,
    Weight = 0.1,
    Type = Drainable,
    UseDelta = 0.1,              // 10% per use (10 uses)
    UseWhileEquipped = FALSE,
    DisplayName = Gunpowder,
    Icon = GunpowderJar,
    WeightEmpty = 0.01,
    WorldStaticModel = GunpowderJar,
}
```

**Key Properties:**
- **Type:** Drainable (has uses, not single-use)
- **UseDelta:** 0.1 (10 uses per container)
- **Weight Full:** 0.1
- **Weight Empty:** 0.01

**Usage in Recipes:**
```
recipe Example {
    Base.GunPowder=10,      // Uses 10 units (1 full container)
    Result:Output,
}
```

### Other Related Materials
| Name | Item ID | Use |
|------|---------|-----|
| Scrap Metal | `Base.ScrapMetal` | Metal source for bullets |
| Sheet Metal | `Base.SheetMetal` | Metal crafting |
| Metal Bar | `Base.MetalBar` | Refined metal |
| Iron Ingot | `Base.IronIngot` | Smelted metal |

## Complete Ammunition Categories

### Handgun Ammunition
- **9mm:** `Base.Bullets9mm` (most common)
- **.45 Auto:** `Base.Bullets45`
- **.38 Special:** `Base.Bullets38`
- **.44 Magnum:** `Base.Bullets44` (powerful)

### Rifle Ammunition
- **5.56mm:** `Base.556Bullets` (assault rifles)
- **.223:** `Base.223Bullets` (hunting rifles)
- **.308:** `Base.308Bullets` (hunting rifles, most powerful)

### Shotgun Ammunition
- **Shotgun Shells:** `Base.ShotgunShells`

## Vanilla Crafting Recipes

### Disassemble Ammo Box
```
recipe Open Box of 9mm Bullets {
    Bullets9mmBox,

    Result:Bullets9mm=30,
    Sound:BoxOfRoundsOpenOne,
    Time:15.0,
}
```

### Assemble Ammo Box
```
recipe Place 9mm Bullets in Box {
    Bullets9mm=30,

    Result:Bullets9mmBox,
    Sound:BoxOfRoundsOpenOne,
    Time:15.0,
}
```

### Extract Gunpowder (Hypothetical)
```
recipe Extract GunPowder from Bullets {
    Base.Bullets9mm=10,      // Consume bullets

    Result:Base.GunPowder=2, // Get some gunpowder back
    Time:100.0,
}
```

## Ammunition by Weapon Type

### Pistols
| Weapon | Ammo | Magazine | Capacity |
|--------|------|----------|----------|
| M9 Pistol | 9mm | Base.9mmClip | 15 |
| M1911 Pistol | .45 Auto | Base.45Clip | 7 |
| D-E Pistol | .44 Magnum | Base.44Clip | 8 |
| M36 Revolver | .38 Special | N/A (revolver) | 6 |
| M625 Revolver | .45 Auto | N/A (revolver) | 6 |

### Rifles
| Weapon | Ammo | Magazine | Capacity |
|--------|------|----------|----------|
| MSR700 Rifle | .223 | Base.223Clip | 3 |
| MSR788 Rifle | .308 | Base.308Clip | 3 |
| M16 Assault Rifle | 5.56mm | Base.556Clip | 30 |
| M14 Rifle | .308 | Base.M14Clip | 20 |

### Shotguns
| Weapon | Ammo | Magazine | Capacity |
|--------|------|----------|----------|
| Shotgun | Shotgun Shells | N/A | 2-6 (varies) |
| Sawed-off Shotgun | Shotgun Shells | N/A | 2 |
| Double Barrel Shotgun | Shotgun Shells | N/A | 2 |
| JS-2000 Shotgun | Shotgun Shells | N/A | 6 |

## Item Spawning (Debug)

### Spawn Individual Rounds
```
Base.Bullets9mm
Base.ShotgunShells
Base.308Bullets
```

### Spawn Boxes
```
Base.Bullets9mmBox
Base.ShotgunShellsBox
Base.308Box
```

### Spawn Molds
```
Base.9mmBulletsMold
Base.ShotgunShellsMold
Base.308BulletsMold
Base.223BulletsMold
```

### Spawn Crafting Materials
```
Base.GunPowder
Base.ScrapMetal
```

## Ammunition Scarcity & Balance

### Rarity (Most to Least Common)
1. **9mm** - Very common (police, civilians)
2. **Shotgun Shells** - Common (civilian hunting)
3. **.38 Special** - Common (police revolvers)
4. **5.56mm** - Uncommon (military)
5. **.45 Auto** - Uncommon
6. **.308** - Uncommon (hunting)
7. **.223** - Uncommon (hunting)
8. **.44 Magnum** - Rare (powerful)

### Crafting Balance Suggestions
When creating bullet recipes:
- **Common ammo (9mm):** Easier recipes, less materials
- **Powerful ammo (.44, .308):** Harder recipes, more materials
- **Military ammo (5.56mm):** Require higher skills

**Example:**
```
// Common 9mm - Easy
recipe Craft 9mm Bullets {
    Base.ScrapMetal=1,
    Base.GunPowder=5,
    keep Base.9mmBulletsMold,

    Result:Base.Bullets9mm=10,
    Time:200.0,
}

// Powerful .308 - Harder
recipe Craft .308 Bullets {
    Base.ScrapMetal=3,
    Base.GunPowder=15,
    keep Base.308BulletsMold,
    keep Base.Hammer,

    Result:Base.308Bullets=5,
    Time:400.0,
    SkillRequired:MetalWelding=5,
}
```

## Source Files
- **Vanilla Items:** `R:\Games\Steam\steamapps\common\ProjectZomboid\media\scripts\items.txt`
- **Vanilla Weapons:** `R:\Games\Steam\steamapps\common\ProjectZomboid\media\scripts\items_weapons.txt`
- **Vanilla New Items:** `R:\Games\Steam\steamapps\common\ProjectZomboid\media\scripts\newitems.txt`
- **PZ Wiki:** https://pzwiki.net/w/index.php?oldid=384163
- **Research Date:** 2025-11-06
